column2: Kimco Realty Corp. is a real estate investment trust company, which engages in the ownership and operation of open-air shopping centers. The company is headquartered in New Hyde Park, New York and currently employs 533 full-time employees. The firm is specialized in shopping center acquisitions, development, management, and operation of open-air shopping centers, which are anchored generally by discounters, grocery stores, and service-oriented tenants. The firm has interests in approximately 420 United States shopping centers and mixed-use assets comprising of over 73.6 million square feet of gross leasable area (GLA).
3333 New Hyde Park Rd, PO Box 5020
